errors.name: invalid-date-range
errors.message: Invalid date interval. Please make sure that the start date goes before the end date.

errors.name: invalid-categories
errors.message: No categories have been chosen. Please select at least one of them or pick 'All' value.

errors.name: invalid-items
errors.message: No items have been chosen. Please select at least one of them or pick 'All' value.
